channel.title: Neopets Script Request List
channel.description:
Any Coders out there that Plays Neopets? I know there are lol so far Ive only found a few good Scripts.
I ask that any coders willing to make some to Please Make the Following:
[b]Maths Nightmare Script:[/b] One came with SCAR but Dosent work ... at all o.o SO If Someone Makes one or knows of one that actually works please Tell me :)
[b]Korbats Lab:[/b] Im good at this kind of game but for some reason Im not good at korbats lab o.o
[b]Magax:[/b] I cant even beat the first level XD I REALLY Stink at this game
[b]Buzzer Game:[/b] TNT Fixed the Glitch in the game to where you cant see the Hand :P So now I dont get far on this either.
[b]Whack A Staff:[/b] Im actually good at this game and got the Avatar in no time :) But Not enough for trophy so If someone made a good script for this that would be awesome
These are just a few of the MANY Scripts Id like to have but I dont really need ALL XD Just one or two would work
[b]Thanks if You decide to make one :D[/b][br][size=1]Posted at: August 17, 2006, 02:59:20 PM[/size][hr]My script Requests sound hard to make XD[br][size=1]Posted at: August 19, 2006, 06:58:42 AM[/size][hr]Guess my list is difficult XD
